headline: Avery Dennison : opens its first India-based RFID production facility and unveils unique inlay innovation to meet local customer needs
summary: PUNE, India, 24 April 2025 - Avery Dennison Corporation , a global materials science and digital identification solutions company, has announced the opening of its first radio-frequency...
